Indonesia Canangkan Hari Bantuan Hukum Nasional Setiap 2 November
03 Nov 2019, 12:42 by Retno M



Indonesia Canangkan Hari Bantuan Hukum Nasional Setiap 2 November



Indonesia Canangkan Hari Bantuan Hukum Nasional Setiap 2 November



Indonesia Canangkan Hari Bantuan Hukum Nasional Setiap 2 November


KBRN, Jakarta : Untuk pertama kalinya Indonesia resmi mencanangkan Hari Bantuan Hukum Nasional. Pencanangan yang dipimpin langsung oleh kepala Badan Pembinaan Hukum Nasional dari kementerian hukum dan HAM, Benny Riyanto, itu menetapkan Hari Bantuan Hukum Nasional jatuh setiap tanggal 2 November.
Benny Riyanto mengatakan, dengan penetapan Hari Bantuan Hukum Nasional itu diharapkan pemberian bantuan hukum dapat merata pada seluruh lapisan masyarakat dengan didukung pula oleh pemerintah provinsi dan kabupaten/kota.
“Memang untuk mencapai dikatakan maksimal ini butuh semua stakeholder terlibat termasuk dalam hal ini pemerintah provinsi dan kabupaten/kota itu harus ikut support terhadap hal ini dan selama ini sudah cukup bagus ada beberapa pemerintah provinsi dan kabupaten/kota yang sudah membuat perda bantuan hukum. Kita memang harus bersinergi dan sama-sama bertanggungjawab agar yang namanya azaz equality before the law, jadi keadilan itu harus sama buat seluruh warga masyarakat itu bisa terwujud,” ungkap Benny Riyanto yang ditemui di sela-sela pencanangan Hari Bantuan Hukum Nasional yang dirangkaikan dengan pelaksanaan Fun Bike for Justice di kawasan area bebas kendaraan (CFD), Minggu (3/11/2019), Jakarta.
Lebih lanjut Benny menambahkan, meski demikian sektor hukum Indonesia masih memiliki sejumlah PR, terutama dalam pengintegrasian antar lembaga yang wajib memberikan bantuan hukum.
“Yang masih menjadi PR utama yaitu perlunya diintegrasikan antara lembaga-lembaga khususnya terkait dengan lembaga yang wajib memberikan bantuan hukum. Antara lain yaitu, pemerintah melalui Kementerian Hukum dan HAM melalui Badan Pembinaan Hukum Nasional di tempat kami. Juga Mahkamah Agung, yang memiliki program PRODEO (pemberian bantuan hukum didalam berperkara di pengadilan secara cuma-cuma bagi masyarakat yang tidak mampu). Kemudian, organisasi advokat yaitu dimana didalam undang-undang advokat itu ada kewajiban untuk memberikan bantuan hukum secara cuma-cuma terhadap masyarakat yang tidak mampu, itu yang namanya PROBONO yang dikelola oleh organisasi advokat,” paparnya.
Benny Riyanto menyatakan, organisasi bantuan hukum memiliki peran besar pula, dalam memberikan bantuan hukum secara cuma-cuma bagi masyarakat tidak mampu baik bersifat ligitasi maupun non litigasi.
“Bantuan hukum ini bisa yang sifatnya litigasi atau pembelaan di muka pengadilan dan bisa bersifat non litigasi yaitu pemberian bantuan hukum di luar pengadilan, bisa berupa penyuluhan hukum atau konsultasi hukum,” terang Benny.
Sementara, sepanjang tahun 2018 setidaknya sebanyak 524 organisasi bantuan hukum di seluruh Indonesia resmi mendapatkan akreditasi dari kementerian hukum dan HAM.
Pencanangan Hari Bantuan Hukum Nasional dirangkaikan dengan pelaksanaan Fun Bike for Justice, yang diikuti oleh ratusan peserta dari kalangan masyarakat maupun jajaran kementerian hukum dan HAM, Minggu, 3 November 2019, di area bebas kendaraan (CFD).
Kegiatan juga dirangkaikan dengan pemberian pelayanan bantuan hukum secara gratis dan dioperasikannya mobil penyuling (penyuluhan hukum keliling). Mobil penyuling sendiri berfungsi setiap kali keliling kota memberikan penyuluhan hukum, serta berfungsi pula sebagai perpustakaan keliling agar masyarakat cerdas akan hukum.

Indonesia Launches National Legal Aid Day Every 2 November
Nov 3, 2019, 12:42 by Retno M



Indonesia Launches National Legal Aid Day Every 2 November



Indonesia Launches National Legal Aid Day Every 2 November



Indonesia Launches National Legal Aid Day Every 2 November


KBRN, Jakarta: For the first time Indonesia officially launched the National Legal Aid Day. The declaration, which was led directly by the head of the National Legal Development Agency from the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Benny Riyanto, set the National Legal Aid Day to fall every November 2.
Benny Riyanto said, with the establishment of the National Legal Aid Day it was expected that the provision of legal assistance could be evenly distributed to all levels of society with the support of the provincial and district / city governments.
"Indeed, to achieve this, it is said that all stakeholders need to be involved, including in this case the provincial and district / city governments must support this, and so far it is good that there are several provincial and district / city governments that have made legal aid regulations. We really have to work together and be jointly responsible so that the name of azaz equality before the law, so justice must be the same for all citizens to be realized, "said Benny Riyanto, who was met on the sidelines of the launching of the National Legal Aid Day which is coupled with the implementation of Fun Bike for Justice in the vehicle free area (CFD), Sunday (3/11/2019), Jakarta.
Benny further added, however, the Indonesian legal sector still has a number of public relations, especially in the integration between institutions that are required to provide legal assistance.
"What is still the main PR is the need to be integrated between institutions specifically related to institutions that are required to provide legal assistance. Among other things, namely, the government through the Ministry of Law and Human Rights through the National Legal Development Agency in our place. Also the Supreme Court, which has a PRODEO program (providing legal assistance in litigation in court for free to people who can not afford). Then, the advocate organization is where in the law the advocate has an obligation to provide legal assistance free of charge to disadvantaged people, that is called PROBONO which is managed by an advocate organization, "he explained.
Benny Riyanto said that legal aid organizations also have a big role to play in providing free legal assistance to disadvantaged people, both litigation and non-litigation.
"This legal assistance can be litigation or defense before the court and can be non litigation, namely the provision of legal assistance outside the court, can be in the form of legal counseling or legal consultation," explained Benny.
Meanwhile, throughout 2018 at least 524 legal aid organizations throughout Indonesia officially received accreditation from the Ministry of Law and Human Rights.
The launching of the National Legal Aid Day was linked to the implementation of Fun Bike for Justice, which was attended by hundreds of participants from the community and the Ministry of Justice and Human Rights, Sunday, November 3, 2019, in a vehicle free area (CFD).
Activities are also coupled with the provision of free legal aid services and the operation of a distillery (mobile legal counseling). The distiller's own car functions every time around the city providing legal counseling, and also functions as a mobile library so that people are smart about the law.
